refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to interact with a graph based visualization of the structure of .g databases.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Used to interact with a graph based visualization of the structure of .g databases.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The examples demonstrate the use of the igraph command to view the corresponding graph of a .g database and access information about it.

example.title: Launches a new window that displays the graph that corresponds to a .g database.

listitem.para: Displays a graph that corresponds to the currently opened .g database.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
